name: playwright-e2e-tests
description: Welcome to the frontend web tests based on playwright

scripts.test:run:local: npm run build && npx playwright test --config=playwright_local_config.ts
scripts.test:stg: npm run build && npx playwright test --config=playwright_stg_config.ts --reporter=html,list
scripts.test:prod: npm run build && npx playwright test --config=playwright_prod_config.ts --reporter=html,list
